content.prompt: The excerpt best serves as evidence in support of which of the following arguments about the home front during and after the First World War?

choices.label: African Americans who moved to cities of the North and West encountered discrimination.
Middle-class reformers sought to improve living and working conditions for the urban working classes.
The United States departed from its foreign policy of noninvolvement in order to defend democracy.
Increased anxieties about political radicalism led to restrictions on the freedom of speech.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
